titles.title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to allow employers a 200 percent deduction for amounts paid or incurred for training employees.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: 2/25/1999--Introduced. Amends the Internal Revenue Code to provide a 200 percent deduction to employers for amounts paid or incurred for training employees. Sets forth revenue offset provisions.
